Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Hamlin, due to street blockage near Jackson/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Pulaski, Harrison, Independence and Jackson including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Congress, Pulaski and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/82nd
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 79th, King drive, 83rd and Cottage grove: due to, police activity near Cottage Grove/82nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 79th, King drive, 83rd, Cottage and over regular route, due to police activity near Cottage Grove/82nd.
